meanings.definition: A substance that deters insects or other pests.
meanings.sent1: I sprayed the repellant to keep mosquitoes away during our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The camping store sells various types of insect repellant.
meanings.sent3: The ants took one whiff of the repellant and scurried away in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: Her strong repellant against spiders was evident as she screamed at the sight of one.
meanings.sent5: The repellant worked like magic, creating a shield against unwanted bugs.

meanings.sent1: The repellant smell from the garbage made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The movie's repellant scenes made many viewers look away.
meanings.sent3: The repellant taste of the medicine made the child refuse to take it.
meanings.sent4: His repellant behavior towards others isolated him from making friends.
meanings.sent5: The repellant sight of the decaying food turned everyone's stomachs.
